ðŸ“– Summary: The DCOMUploadExec repository provides a proof-of-concept tool for lateral movement by abusing the DCOM IMsiServer interface. It allows uploading and executing a .NET assembly payload on a remote machine. The tool requires a strong-named assembly and configuration of payload details in PayloadConfig.h.
